name: Jump legends: Nin Bears Battle
description:
Wipe your enemy off the box & battle for power ups! Jump right into action, Now!

Win against your enemy 3 times to get powerful power ups.
Jump and battle with cute kung fu animals and the ninja masters!
Tap, jump and throw your enemy off the battle box.
Unlock powerful abilities to destroy your opponent.
The more you play the harder it gets. Ready to play?
Endless Challenges, react fast and enjoy victory.
Ninja's have to battle their way to the top of the fighting empire.
Download Now!
